synopsis: Thirteen students in all in Year 10, Class Black. Twelve assassins, one target. The first to kill the target will get whatever they want. As one of the assassins, Tokaku Azuma joins Class Black and begins to size up the competition.

title.jp: Mune no Naka ni Iru no wa?

synopsis: All 13 students are now assembled and things are about to get serious. But one of them thinks she can jump the gun and beat everyone to the prize.

title.jp: Akai no ni, Akakunai no wa?

synopsis: Tokaku switches sides to Haru, but the game is still on and the first official Class Black assassination attempt is made.

title.jp: Totsuzen Yattekite, Kaeru Koto no Nai Mono wa?

synopsis: It's three straight days of testing for Class Black. While Haru is intent on passing those tests, another one of the girls is intent on killing her.

title.jp: Kago no Tori wo Soto ni Dasu ni wa?

synopsis: Class Black prepares to put on a production of "Romeo and Juliet" for the school festival and another assassin tries her luck.

title.jp: Kirei na Hana ni wa (__) ga Aru

synopsis: Class Black puts on "Romeo and Juliet" in front of a student audience, but with so many deaths in the play, maybe one or two will be real.
Another assassin tries her hand, but this one proposes a game with rules that will give Haru and Tokaku a chance to beat her fair and square.
The field has been whittled to four assassins. With classes done and a typhoon closing in, Haru and Tokaku are in for a harrowing evening.

title.jp: Mune no Naka ni Iru no wa? (Tsuishi) (胸の中にいるのは?

synopsis: Tokaku faces Isuke and her own inner demons, while Haru desperately tries to stay ahead of Shinya.
With Class Black down to four students, Tokaku and Haru face off against the person they consider to be their final opponent.
The truth about Class Black is revealed, and Tokaku and Haru must grapple with the implications of this new information.

title.jp: Yueni, Sekai wa __ ni Michite Iru

synopsis: Now that Tokaku has delivered her advance notice, the three remaining members of Class Black have one last assassination attempt to sort out.
